| Property       | Attribute       | Description | Type     | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `filterInvert` | `filter-invert` |             | `string` | `'0'`       |
| `listStyle`    | `list-style`    |             | `string` | `'none'`    |
| `opacity`      | `opacity`       |             | `string` | `'0'`       |
